title: The Colour Of Magic - DVD Encoded
description:
Adapted from Wikipedia.org

----------------------------------

Terry Pratchett&#039;s The Colour of Magic is a two-part television adaptation of a combination of both The Colour of Magic and The Light Fantastic by Terry Pratchett, produced by The Mob, and first broadcast on Sky One, and in High Definition on Sky One HD, over Easter 2008. It is the second live-action adaptation of a Discworld novel, the first being Terry Pratchett&#039;s Hogfather.

The plot of the adaptation follows the plot of the first two Discworld novels, The Colour of Magic and The Light Fantastic, where a failed wizard, Rincewind, is tasked by the Patrician of Ankh-Morpork with looking after the Discworld&#039;s first tourist Twoflower.

Cast
----

    * Sir David Jason - Rincewind
    * Sean Astin - Twoflower
    * Tim Curry - Trymon
    * Christopher Lee - Death (voice)
    * Jeremy Irons - Patrician Vetinari
    * David Bradley - Cohen the Barbarian
    * Laura Haddock - Bethan
    * James Cosmo - Galder Weatherwax
    * Nicolas Tennant - Head Librarian
    * Karen David - Liessa
    * Liz May Brice - Herrena
    * Nigel Planer - Arch-Astronomer
    * Richard Da Costa - Luggage
    * Arthur White - Rerpf
    * Miles Richardson - Zlorf
    * Stephen Marcus - Boardman

As with the previous live-action film adaptation, Terry Pratchett&#039;s Hogfather, Terry Pratchett had a cameo role, playing Astrozoologist 2.

Official website: http://www.skyoneonline.co.uk/tcom/


---

Encoded using WinAVI 8.0 - Menu included.
